review_text: HAD ONE OF THESE FOR YEARS AND LOVED IT; LOST IT SOMEWHERE, AND DIDN'T REALIZE HOW MUCH I MISSED USING IT;MAKES SERVING PICKLES SO MUCH EASIER AND NO MESS;PRODUCT IS VERY WELL MADE AND SO STURDY; SUCH A WELCOME ADDITION TO MY KITCHEN;
product_name: Tupperware Large Pick a Deli Container
